name: your-feature
description: A project skeleton for feature development

scripts.uglifyJS: rimraf build/js && mkdirp build/js && uglifyjs src/js/*.js -m -c -o build/js/app.js
scripts.images: rimraf build/images && mkdirp build/images && imagemin src/images/* -o build/images
scripts.minifyCSS: rimraf build/css && mkdirp build/css && gulp minifyCSS
scripts.clean: rimraf src/css/* src/js/* src/images/* && mkdirp src/images/sprites

author: Guan Ce
